scripts.uglify:dist: uglifyjs  build/src/Interfaces.js build/src/references.js build/src/DataHub.js build/src/MidiIO.js build/src/BarGrid.js build/src/Analyzer.js build/src/Normalizer.js build/src/App.js -b > ./index.js
scripts.uglify:test: uglifyjs  build/src/references.js build/src/Interfaces.js build/src/DataHub.js build/src/MidiIO.js build/src/BarGrid.js build/src/Analyzer.js build/src/Normalizer.js build/test/spec/CxSheetSpec.js -b > ./index_spec.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:tsc && npm run uglify:dist && npm run uglify:test
